sentences.english: Conclusions Synovial sarcoma of the hypopharynx is a malignant soft-tissue tumor that is seen rarely in the head and neck.
sentences.chinese: 結論喉咽部滑膜肉瘤是頭頸部罕見的軟組織惡性腫瘤。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze Ⅱ~Ⅲ synovial osteochondromatosis of imaging findings.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析Ⅱ～Ⅲ期滑膜骨軟骨瘤病的影像學表現。

sentences.english: The Synoviocytes form a distinct structure called the synovial lining layer.
sentences.chinese: 滑膜細胞形成被稱爲滑膜襯裏層的特殊結構。

sentences.english: The Synoviocytes form a distinct structure called the synovial lining layer.
sentences.chinese: 滑膜細胞形成被稱爲滑膜襯裏層的特殊結構。

sentences.english: Come on inchoate because synovitis of Zhi foot joint is local, often produce gall.
sentences.chinese: 發病早期常由於跖趾關節滑膜炎局部發生腫痛。

sentences.english: Results Sinomenine could induce apoptosis of synoviocytes in CIA rats.
sentences.chinese: 結果青藤鹼組CIA大鼠滑膜細胞的凋亡數明顯增加。

sentences.english: Computed tomography-guided biopsy confirmed the diagnosis of synovial sarcoma.
sentences.chinese: 經過電腦斷層導引的切片檢查，確定診斷爲滑膜肉瘤。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment of the juvenile synovial hemangioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討兒童滑膜血管瘤的診斷和治療。

sentences.english: Methods The clinical pathological characteristics of benign synovialoma were analysed in 15 cases.
sentences.chinese: 方法分析15例良性滑膜瘤的臨牀病理學特點。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the diagnosis and differential diagnosis of benign synovialoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高對良性滑膜瘤的診斷和鑑別診斷能力。

sentences.english: Synovial sarcoma is an extremely rare tumor of the mediastinum.
sentences.chinese: 縱隔腔的滑膜肉瘤是一個相當罕見的腫瘤。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate imaging diagnostic value of synovial osteochondromatosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討影像檢查對滑膜骨軟骨瘤病的診斷價值。

sentences.english: No obvious change in apoptosis could be seen in bursa synoriale and mineralized fibrocartilage.
sentences.chinese: 滑膜囊和鈣化軟骨區的細胞凋亡無明顯變化。

sentences.english: To relate position and types of synovial plica with clinical symptoms and signs.
sentences.chinese: 滑膜皺襞的位置及類型與臨牀症狀和體徵密切相關。

sentences.english: Methods 181 patients with traumatic synovitis were randomly divided into 2 groups.
sentences.chinese: 方法181例膝關節創傷性滑膜炎患者隨機分爲2組。
